mapper.select:
select to_char(minus_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as minus_dt, to_char(order_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as order_dt, user_no, user_name, seller_no, seller_name, category_id, name, total_price, minus_price, profit, minus_yn from profit where minus_yn='1'
and minus_dt between to_date(#{start}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(to_date(#{end}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + INTERVAL '1' DAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select to_char(minus_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as daily, sum(profit) as pf from profit where minus_yn=1
and to_date(minus_dt, 'yy/mm/dd') = to_date(#{start}, 'yy/mm/dd')
group by minus_dt order by 1 desc

select (select to_char(minus_dt, 'IW') FROM dual) as weekly, (select TO_CHAR(TRUNC(minus_dt,'iw'),'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual) as start_dt, (select TO_CHAR(TRUNC(minus_dt,'iw')+6,'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual) as end_dt, sum(profit) as pf from profit where minus_yn=1
and to_date((select TO_CHAR(TRUNC(minus_dt,'iw'),'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual), 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_date(#{start}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
group by to_char(minus_dt, 'IW'), TO_CHAR(TRUNC(minus_dt,'iw'),'yyyy-mm-dd'), TO_CHAR(TRUNC(minus_dt,'iw')+6,'yyyy-mm-dd') order by 1 desc
